Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: Update the properties of the receiver’s sprite.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.name: updateInputs()
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html#/s:1.abstract: Update the status of this receiver based on new inputs.

Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html.name: GameSignalReceivable
Protocols/GameSignalReceivable.html.abstract: A base protocol that defines an object that receives signals from inputs.

Structs/SwitchRequisite.html.name: SwitchRequisite
Structs/SwitchRequisite.html.abstract: A data structure that represents a configuration for a switch requisite.

Classes/DoorReceiver.html.name: DoorReceiver
Classes/DoorReceiver.html.abstract: A class that represents a door. This is commonly used for exit doors, but can be adapted to use any door.

Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/c:@M@The.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/c:@M@The.abstract: Required initializer for this class. Will result in a fatal error if you initialize the object this way.

Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/s:17The_.name: shouldActivateOnIntervention(with:objects:)
Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/s:17The_.abstract: Whether the input should turn on/off based on player or object intervention.

Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/s:17The_.name: onActivate(with:player:)

Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/s:17The_.name: onDeactivate(with:player:)
Classes/GamePressurePlate.html#/s:17The_.abstract: Determine if the player is out of range and play the pressure plate deactivation sound.

Classes/GameLever.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GameLever.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.abstract: Required initializer for this class. Will result in a fatal error if you initialize the object this way.

Classes/GameComputer.html#/c:@M@The_Cost.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GameComputer.html#/c:@M@The_Cost.abstract: Required initializer for this class. Will result in a fatal error if you initialize the object this way.

Classes/GameAlarmClock.html#/s:17The_Cos.name: onActivate(with:player:)
Classes/GameAlarmClock.html#/s:17The_Cos.abstract: Trigger the alarm sound and continously play the tick sound.

Classes/GameAlarmClock.html#/c:@M@The_Co.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GameAlarmClock.html#/c:@M@The_Co.abstract: Required initializer for this class. Will result in a fatal error if you initialize the object this way.

Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.name: gameAchievement

Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/c:@.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/c:@.abstract: Required initializer for this class. Will result in a fatal error if you initialize the object this way.

Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.name: shouldActivateOnIntervention(with:objects:)
Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.abstract: Whether the input should turn on/off based on player or object intervention.

Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.name: onActivate(with:player:)
Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html#/s:1.abstract: Activate an achievement when entering the field.

Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html#/s:17Th.name: activeOncePermanently
Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html#/s:17Th.abstract: The input is active once and remains active permanently.

Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html#/s:17Th.name: activeByPlayerIntervention
Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html#/s:17Th.abstract: The input is active when a player interacts with it, either by distance or collision.

Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html#/s:17Th.name: activeOnTimer
Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html#/s:17Th.abstract: The input is active on a timer and then deactivates.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: active
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: Whether the input is currently active. Defaults to false.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: activationMethod
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The method that this input will activate. Default is by player intervention.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: kind
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The kind of sender. Defaults to a trigger.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: baseTexture
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The name of the base texture for this input.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: cooldown
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The number of seconds it takes for the input to toggle.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: levelPosition
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The position of this input in context with the level.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: activeTexture
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: The texture for this input, accounting for active states.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/c:@M@The_.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/c:@M@The_.abstract: Required initializer for this class. Will result in a fatal error if you initialize the object this way.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.name: shouldActivateOnIntervention(with:objects:)
Classes/GameSignalSender.html#/s:17The_C.abstract: Whether the input should turn on/off based on player or object intervention.

Classes/GameSignalSender.html.name: GameSignalSender

Enums/GameSignalKind.html.name: GameSignalKind
Enums/GameSignalKind.html.abstract: An enumeration that represent the different kinds of inputs.

Enums/GameSignalInputMethod.html.name: GameSignalInputMethod

Enums/GameSignalMethod.html.name: GameSignalMethod
Enums/GameSignalMethod.html.abstract: An enumeration that represents the different requirements for an output to activate.

Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html.name: GameAchievementTrigger
Classes/GameAchievementTrigger.html.abstract: A class representation of a Game Center achievement trigger.

Classes/GameAlarmClock.html.name: GameAlarmClock
Classes/GameAlarmClock.html.abstract: A class representation of an alarm clock (timer).

Classes/GamePressurePlate.html.name: GamePressurePlate

Classes/PauseScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: mainMenuButton

Classes/PauseScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: resumeButton

Classes/PauseScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.name: sceneDidLoad()
Classes/PauseScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.abstract: Set up the scene and hook up the buttons to make the pause menu functional.

Classes/PauseScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.name: mouseDown(with:)

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: startButton

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: resumeButton

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: quitButton
Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.abstract: The label node for the “Quit Game” button.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/s:17The_Cost.name: gameCenterButton

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.name: didMove(to:)
Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.abstract: Set up the Game Center button for the main menu.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.name: sceneDidLoad()
Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.abstract: Set up the scene and play the main menu music.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.name: mouseDown(with:)

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.name: rightMouseDown(with:)

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.name: didFinishUpdate()

Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.name: gameCenterViewControllerDidFinish(_:)
Classes/MainMenuScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cos.abstract: Dismiss the Game Center view controller when done.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: moveUpKey
Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label that corresponds to the move up key.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: moveLeftKey
Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label that corresponds to the move left key.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: moveRightKey
Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label that corresponds to the move right key.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: moveDownKey
Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label that corresponds to the move down key.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: prevCostumeKey
Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label that corresponds to the change costume (previous) key.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: nextCostumeKey
Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label that corresponds to the change costume (next) key.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: useKey
Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label that corresponds to the use key.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: startButton
Classes/IntroScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label that corresponds to the start button.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.name: sceneDidLoad()
Classes/IntroScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.abstract: Set up the scene and load in the corresponding keyboard shortcuts.

Classes/IntroScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.name: mouseDown(with:)

Classes/EndGameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cost.name: sceneDidLoad()
Classes/EndGameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Cost.abstract: Set up the scene, play the reveal animation, and unlock the “Underneath it All” achievement.

Classes/AboutScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: backButton
Classes/AboutScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label node that corresponds to the back button.

Classes/AboutScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: title

Classes/AboutScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.name: versionString
Classes/AboutScene.html#/s:17The_Costume.abstract: The label node that corresponds to the version string.

Classes/AboutScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.name: sceneDidLoad()

Classes/AboutScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.name: mouseDown(with:)

Classes/AboutScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costum.name: keyDown(with:)

Classes/AboutScene.html.name: AboutScene
Classes/AboutScene.html.abstract: The SpriteKit scene class for the about screen.

Classes/EndGameScene.html.name: EndGameScene
Classes/EndGameScene.html.abstract: The SpriteKit scene class that runs the end animation.

Classes/IntroScene.html.name: IntroScene
Classes/IntroScene.html.abstract: The SpriteKit scene associated with the intro scene.

Classes/MainMenuScene.html.name: MainMenuScene
Classes/MainMenuScene.html.abstract: The scene class for the main menu.

Classes/PauseScene.html.name: PauseScene
Classes/PauseScene.html.abstract: The SpriteKit scene class for the pause menu.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: costumeID
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The ID that determines what costumes are avaiable, with 0 indicating no costumes annd 3 indicating all costumes.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: linksToNextScene
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The name of the SKScene that will load after the current scene this level configuration is attached to.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: startWithCostume
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The costume the player will start with by default.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: exitLocation
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The matrix location of the exit door.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: defaultTimerDelay
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The default amount of time on alarm clock timers.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: requisites
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: A list of the requisites for switches and receivers.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: achievementTrigger
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: The achievement to earn when passing through the achievement trigger, if one exists.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: default
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: A default level configuration with no costumes loaded and the next scene set to the main menu.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.name: parseRequisites(from:)
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html#/s:1.abstract: Parse a given dictionary into a list of requisites.

Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: unit
Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The base unit size for a given tile in a level.

Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: structure
Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: A child node that stores the structure of the level.

Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.name: sceneDidLoad()
Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.abstract: Set up the game scene, parse the tilemapm and start playing music.

Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.name: didFinishUpdate()
Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.abstract: Run any post-update logic and check input states.

Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.name: willMove(from:)
Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.abstract: Prepare the scene for destruction and save the scene name.

Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: checkWallStates(with:)
Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: Check the wall states and update their physics bodies.

Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: checkDoorStates()
Classes/GameScene.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: Check the state of the doors in the level.

Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.name: keyDown(with:)
Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.abstract: Listen to keyboard events and run the game logic for key events.

Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.name: keyUp(with:)
Classes/GameScene.html#/c:@M@The_Costume.abstract: Listen for keyboard events and halt the player if the movement keys were released.

Classes/GameScene.html.name: GameScene
Classes/GameScene.html.abstract: The base class for a given level.

Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html.name: LevelDataConfiguration
Structs/LevelDataConfiguration.html.abstract: A data structure used to determine the properties of a level based on a user data dictionary.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: cameraScale
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: The scale of the camera size for the levels.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: intelligentCameraMovement
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to move the camera intelligently based on constraints or to always follow the player.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: musicVolume
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: The volume at which the music should play.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: playChangeSound
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to play the costume changing sound.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: playComputerSound
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to play the computer turn-on sound.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: playLeverSound
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to play the lever toggle sound.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: playAlarmSound
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to play the alarm clock enable/disable sound.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: canShowUnmodeledOnMenu
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether the player can see the main character with the USB costume partially undone on the main menu.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: showUnmodeledOnMenu
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to show the main character with the USB costume partially undone.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: showNodeCount
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to show the number of nodes in the debugging screen.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: showFramesPerSecond
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to show the number of frames per second in the debugging screen.

Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.name: showPhysicsBodies
Structs/Preferences.html#/s:17The_Costum.abstract: Whether to show the outlines of physics bodies in the debugging screen.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: shared
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: A shared copy of the game store.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: lastSavedScene
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The last scene that was loaded before the game ended.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: costumeIncrementUSB
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The number of times the player switched into the flash drive costume.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: costumeIncrementBird
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The number of times the player switched into the bird costume.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: costumeIncrementSorceress
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: The number of times the player switched into the sorceress costume.

Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.name: clear()
Structs/GameStore.html#/s:17The_Costumem.abstract: Reset the game store to their default values.

Structs/CommandLineArguments.html#/s:17T.name: startLevel
Structs/CommandLineArguments.html#/s:17T.abstract: The name of the file to open on startup. Defaults to nil (no file).

Structs/CommandLineArguments.html.name: CommandLineArguments
Structs/CommandLineArguments.html.abstract: A data structure that contains the command line arguments for the execution context.

Structs/GameStore.html.name: GameStore
Structs/GameStore.html.abstract: A structure that represents the game’s store data.

Structs/Preferences.html.name: Preferences
Structs/Preferences.html.abstract: A data structure that represents the preferences in the game using the standard user defaults.
